title: Heuristics
description: Configuration for a set of memory management (heuristic) techniques.

try.description: A heuristic that attemts to allocate a quantity of memory and fires if it fails.

lowMemory.description: A heuristic that fires when `ActivityManager.getMemoryInfo().lowMemory` becomes true.

mapTester.description: A heuristic that fires when a memory mapped file is unloaded.

canaryProcessTester.description: A heuristic that fires when the canary process tester reports the process is lost..

onTrim.description: A heuristic that fires when `Activity.onTrimMemory` events are received.
